summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a meeting agenda related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes communications between various individuals at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas discussing the agenda for the meeting scheduled on October 22, 2013. The email highlights the internal nature of the communication and the involvement of key personnel.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in the preparation of the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Margaux Mcgrath
persons.context: Margaux Mcgrath is the recipient of the forwarded email containing the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is a Director at Deutsche Bank and is involved in the communication regarding the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is included in the email chain as a recipient regarding the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Monica Gilkinson
persons.context: Monica Gilkinson is mentioned as a recipient who is instructed to use a more client-friendly version of the agenda.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is included in the email chain as a recipient.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is mentioned as a recipient in the email correspondence.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence dated October 22, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email and is an associate at Deutsche Bank.
The email discusses a meeting agenda related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Tazia Smith is a Director at Deutsche Bank and is involved in the communication.
The email indicates a need for a more client-friendly version of the meeting agenda.
